ruleform.research.name: Testing only
ruleform.research.description: This rule is for testing purposes only. It is not 'real'.

ruleform.research.name: HumanProt Import
ruleform.research.description: A flag indicating that this rule is currently being used for importing HumanProt data into Ultra-Structure.

ruleform.research.name: Investigate Data Consistency
ruleform.research.description: Consistency of this data is suspect. Investigate further.

ruleform.resource.name: CoRE
ruleform.resource.notes: A rule with a resource of 'CoRE' is one of the main system rules

ruleform.entity.name: Peptide Foo
ruleform.entity.description: The Foo peptide is lethal! Do not eat!
ruleform.entity.notes: This is most definitely testing data

ruleform.entity.name: Peptide Bar
ruleform.entity.description: The Foo peptide is lethal! Do not eat!
ruleform.entity.notes: This is most definitely testing data

ruleform.attribute.name: Length
ruleform.attribute.description: Denotes the linear length of a thing

ruleform.unit.name: Amino Acids
ruleform.unit.description: A unit of length for protein primary sequences

ruleform.relationship.name: is-a
ruleform.relationship.description: Taxonomic relationship indicating membership in a group or category.

ruleform.relationship.name: includes
ruleform.relationship.description: Taxonomic relationship defining membership in a group or category. In 'A includes B', A is the more general entity, while B is some specialization or grouping of A
